CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 11, 1953, pg. 10 reads: "Modern Grandmothers' Party - A happy group of youngsters enjoyed the Easter Monday party given for them by their grandmothers who have a gala group under the name of Modern Grandmothers. Also invited to the party were the daughters of the club members, many of whom came to help with the hilarious games and with the serving of ice cream and cookies and candies.  The party was held at the Centre Avenue YWCA. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women and children, gathered for Modern Grandmother's Club Easter party in Centre Avenue YWCA
